body.name: 4K Dash Cam Front and Rear Camera, 4K+1080P Dual Dash Cam with WiFi, 3.12 Inch Screen Dash Camera for Cars, Dashboard Camera with Free 64GB SD Card, Super Night Vision, Type-C Port
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 38 mins
features: 【Ultra HD 4K+1080P Dash Cam Front and Rear Camera】This dash cam comes equipped with a 4K Front + 1080P Rear camera that captures clear and sharp footage at a remarkably high resolution. Day or night, it captures license plates and road signs with impressive clarity, providing crucial evidence for any potential accidents. Besides, the front 170°wide-angle and rear 140° viewing angle dash camera for cars means you can capture more of the road and surroundings.

【Dash Cam with Super Clear Night Vision】With the combination of F1.8 large aperture, 6-glass lens and WDR & HDR technology, this car camera dash cam front and rear boasts unparalleled video quality, capturing crisp and clear footage even in low-light conditions, which is crucial for safe driving and incident recording.

【Dash Camera with WiFi and Smart APP Control】This delicate car camera comes with WiFi function and free viidure APP(Work with Android and iOS devices). Connecting to your mobile phones easily through built-in WiFi, it is intuitive to change settings and easy to control this dashcam, view, download and share videos smoothly with your friends through social media.

【Car Dash Cam with 24 Hours Parking Monitor】Drive safer, Park smarter. This dashcams for cars can automatically record and lock videos when car is triggered by a motion or collision event when parked. Monitor your car security in 24x7 with this 4k dash cam(Hard wire kit is needed). Accident scene can be truly restored and give you piece of mind.

【Powerful Dual Dash Cam and Easy Installation】This compact, sleek and feature-packed dashboard camera comes with 3.12 inch screen which ensures it doesn't obstruct your view. Besides, this camera for car has G-sensor, Loop recording, WDR, Type-C port , free 64GB SD card and so on, this dash cam can support up to 256GB SD Card. Meanwhile, setup is a breeze, this front and rear dash camera is a must-have for safety and documenting trips.

【Hassle-Free Installation of Dash Cam】This 4K dash cam is easy to setup and use. Navigating the menu and adjusting settings on the dash camera is incredibly intuitive.The buttons are responsive, and the interface is straightforward, making it easy to customize preferences and review footage.Setup is a breeze, this car dash cam is a must-have for safety and documenting trips.

【Super After-sales of Dash Camera】This dash cam for cars front and rear comes with an extendable 2 Years warranty and Full Refund within 30 days. If you have any questions or accessories are missed, please let us know, we provide technical support-respond within 24 hours, and a 100% satisfaction guarantee for this car dash cam.

This 4K Dash Cam Front and Rear Camera offers an excellent video quality, advanced features, hassle-free set up. It's a reliable dash cam to make it an essential tool for both daily commutes and long journeys.

Dashboard Camera with Type-C Port This dash camera comes with a Type-C Port car charger power cord and a Type-C rear cam port. It ensures faster transmission speed and less issues like black screen, restarting problem. Powerful and Waterproof 1080P Rear Camera This dash cam comes with a 1080P high resolution 140°wide angle rear camera, which provides four lane coverage without any blind spot from back of your car. The rear camera can be installed on both inside and outside of vehicles.
Previous page Next page 1 Easy Installation Dashcam 2 What’s in the Box?

Does this dash cam comes with a SD Card? If not, what is the recommended size? This dash cam supports 16GB-256GB, and a 64GB card is already inserted in dash camera. Please format SD Card on dash cam before first use. If you're considering purchasing a new one, we recommend using a U3 Class 10 SD card for optimal performance. Can I use this dual dash cam without APP? Yes, you can use this 4K dash cam without APP. When this dual dash cam is plugged into car cigarette lighter socket, and if you start/ stop your car, this car camera will auto turn on and record/ turn off after about 5mins. Does the screen go dark after a period of time or does it stay on the while time the dash camera is on? This dash cam has screen saver function, there are off, 30s, 1mins, 3mins option. If you turn on screensaver function and set it 3mins, then screen will auto go bard after 3min, but dash cam is still recording. How do I retrieve and view the recorded videos of this dashcam? You can playback videos on dash cam directly, or transfer and view videos on a mobile device for dash cams with connectivity features. Alternatively, simply remove the SD card and access the footage on a computer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good camera for the price
reviews.reviewText: Been looking for a dash cam for some time and I'm glad I found this one. Easy installation instructions. I love the quality of the videos it records. The screen display is easy to understand and see. Loop recording is awesome and will not delete crash videos or saved videos. This camera's night vision recording is very good. Great wide angle for both front and rear cameras. Every part of this dash cam is of good quality, so far the performance is quite good. I am very satisfied with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very impressive with this dashcam
reviews.reviewText: I am very satisfied with this camera. The camera is excellent. The app seems to work and easily connects to my phone. Small enough to be low profile but large enough to see the screen easily. It was easy to navigate the menu options to set it up. The video quality is excellent. Installation was easy, and it has worked flawlessly while driving and while in park.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent dash cam
reviews.reviewText: I typically don’t leave reviews, but I have to give a shoutout for this product. I was hesitant when purchasing, but I’m thrilled that I bought it. The installation was a breeze, and it started working right away. I’ve been using it for a few days now, and I feel much more secure while driving with this dash cam.The video quality is excellent, and even the night vision is impressive. The mobile app interface is a bit complex, but I managed to set it up successfully thanks to the video instructions provided. I must say, those video instructions were incredibly helpful.Overall, I’m very satisfied with my purchase, and this dash cam has exceeded my expectations. If you’re considering getting one, I highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A dashcam that solves all needs in the car for that extra layer of evidence!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Got this to use in our truck. These are small in size and do the job very well of a dash camera. Satisfactory performance at this price point.Things I like about this product:- Functional product overall with both front and rear cameras- Decent picture/video quality with 1080p with good field of view- Screen has minimal buttons and it is easy to use- Navigation is smooth on the display- Connects to phone app through WiFi to access and control the camera remotely- They do include a nice embedded mount in the package for the camera- Comes with SD loaded to the camera- All needed accessories are included in the bundle- 2 years long warranty includedThings that need improvement:- I would not mind to have a larger screenOverall take: For the price and the size of the camera, it is a value for the money and I would recommend these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive Clarity and Comprehensive Package
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this product, and it has exceeded my expectations. The main highlight is the video quality. Both the 4K front and 1080P rear cameras capture crystal-clear footage, making it easy to read license plates and capture details, even in low light conditions. The super night vision feature truly stands out, providing excellent visibility for nighttime driving.The 3.12-inch screen offers a clear and convenient view without being obtrusive. I particularly appreciated the inclusion of a free 64GB SD card in the package, which is a thoughtful addition and saves the hassle of buying one separately. The WiFi connectivity is seamless, allowing for easy transfer and viewing of footage on my smartphone.Installation was straightforward, thanks to the comprehensive set of accessories provided. It's a plug-and-play device with a user-friendly interface, making it suitable even for those who are not tech-savvy. The Type-C port is a modern touch, ensuring fast data transfer and charging.I would definitely recommend the Otovoda 4K Dash Cam to anyone looking for a high-quality, reliable dash camera system. It's a worthwhile investment for both everyday drives and longer road trips.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is a very nice dash cam. It has high quality of recording images. No matter daytime or midnight, it can record clearly. For the safety, it does have wide vision, and catch plates clearly. The price of this dash cam also valuable. U get free sd card as well. Watching video anytime on your phone. Installation is pretty easy, cuz USER MANUAL has all the details, pretty convenient! I highly recommend this dash cam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good dash cam
reviews.reviewText: This dash cam stands out with top-notch quality, delivering clear recordings day and night. The added perks, like app access and a complimentary SD card, make its already reasonable price even more appealing. Plus, installation is a breeze. I wholeheartedly recommend this dash cam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and easy installation
reviews.reviewText: I bought this dash cam and put it on my Nissan rogue. At the first when I see that many part I started to think it would be very difficult to put on. However things work out very easily when I actually put them on my vehicle.The graphic quality is very high and clear. Even in the night, you can see the picture very clearly. I like this dash cam very much and I think I will continue using it and explore more functions of this product.

I bought this as a gift for my mom since she doesn't have a dash cam. I thought this would be a good candidate since it has 4k resolution and a lot of great features. Also, it was on sale and the price is hard to beat!Pros:- 4k resolution for the front camera and even 1080 for the rear camera!- Great pictures and video quality. I'm not concerned about being able to catch detailed information in the case of an accident.- Also has an app for both Apple and Android that easily connects to your phone via wifi and allows for smooth operation of the dash cam as well as being able to download and save the files you need.- Typical camera features such as G-sensor, lock recordings, loop recording, and even comes with its own 64 gb memory card. The slot allows for up to 256 gb.- Huge 170 degree front camera angle lets you catch a very wide spectrum.- Comes with a rear camera as well to catch anything hitting you from behind.- Simple to use and setup is a breeze.Cons:- NoneOverall, if you're looking for a great little dash cam to put your mind at ease while you drive, I'd recommend getting this one. For the price, it's a great deal. You get all the features of a high-end dash cam, but at a much more affordable price.

The media could not be loaded. This camera was easy to install and has an amazing picture. the frame rate keeps up with real time as you are driving. the reverse cam can be installed on the outside of the vehicle with an option to attach the wire to your reverse system, so it activates when placed in reverse. also has a park aid feature when installed this way. I installed it on the inside of the vehicle for my own convenience. I have boughten cheaper cameras in the past and have got what I paid for. many problems. so far, no problems with this camera and so easy to install. It came with everything you will need. and the included Micro SD card was an added bonus. nice touch. I highly recommend this camera. great picture and picture in picture when recording. up to 5-minute loop feature with overwrite capabilities to save space on the SD card. BUY THIS CAMERA if you are in need of a good camera. it has many features such a G-sensor and motion detection. and many more.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works fine, great value, I do recommend.
reviews.reviewText: I had a dash cam several years ago and it was not good so was hesitant to get another. However, this little dash cam is really great and works good for me. I do believe all the things said from all the good reviews. It's clear day or night, always works, records front and rear views separately, easy to setup, easy to install, and the Viidure app seems to work fine to access camera and when using wi-fi.I installed the front camera kinda behind the rear view mirror so when driving, it's just not blocking any view. I don't really look at it when I'm driving anyway.Instead of installing the rear camera above the license plate, I installed inside at top of rear window - seems to work fine as long as the window is kept clear of snow. I did not connect the rear camera to use as a backup camera so don't know how that works.But nothing is perfect - I found the 3M stickers to hold the cables were not very sticky and did not hold but I then used 2-sided carpet tape and that works ; I like all the features including the mic but would like to turn the mic on or off by pressing a button instead of having to go into the menu ; I currently cannot delete nor unlock the locked videos but have contacted customer service (maybe I will need to format SD card, don't know yet). I consider these all to be minor.I think the price is good when discounted and would buy again, maybe for the wife's car. Based on other cameras, I think the price, functionality, features, and options, are certainly worth it.

My old dash camera got broken, and I’m glad I find this product, come with both camera back and front. very easy to install . Come with memory stick, super convenient and nice product. I will for sure buy another one for my other car !

reviews.reviewTitle: it is super clear image and easy installation
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I am currently in search of a dash cam on the Amazon.ca website that offers 4K image resolution, a complimentary SD card, and the capability to connect to a smartphone via WiFi. I believe 4K resolution is essential, as high-resolution images can be incredibly helpful in the event of an accident. This product meets my requirements well, and although there are numerous dash cams on Amazon, I found this one to be suitable within my budget.The installation of the dash cam was straightforward and only took a couple of minutes. The recorded images are exceptionally clear. I drive approximately 60 km each day, using a 4GB SD card, so a 64GB card should last around 10 days without overwriting. In reality, there's rarely a need to review driving history from ten days prior.My car starts with CarPlay, which automatically connects to my iPhone, preventing a simultaneous WiFi connection with the dash cam. However, this isn't an issue for me since I prefer to download videos to my laptop. I discovered that Windows 11 can't open MP4 videos by default due to licensing issues; you need to download free software like VLC Media Player to access MP4 files. Additionally, a cellphone may not have enough storage for a 64GB video if you wish to preserve your holiday travel history.I am delighted to have found a charger power cord with a USB port, allowing me to use other devices (although my car has a USB port, I use it for listening to music). I highly recommend this product; it's an excellent choice.
